description: This dataset outline the Lux levels emitted from the City of Melbourne owned street lights. The Lux level is stored in the label field and the higher the Lux level the brighter the point of measurement will be.

metadata.description: This dataset outline the Lux levels emitted from the City of Melbourne owned street lights. The Lux level is stored in the label field and the higher the Lux level the brighter the point of measurement will be.

name: Lux Level
